Description.Text: Mirage Fashion Hotel is an elegant 4-star property offering stylish accommodation near the heart of Budapest. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, refined decor and an excellent location just off Heroes' Square, opposite Kunsthalle Budapest. Andrassy ut (a UNESCO World Heritage Site) is an elegant, grand avenue linking the centre of historic Pest with City Park, which is home to a number of art and history museums. Nearby places of interest include Heroes' Square, the Hungarian State Opera House, Dohany Street Synagogue and Budapest Zoo. Hosok tere metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Budapest destinations. The hotel occupies a grand 19th-century villa featuring a white facade with columns, stone balconies, decorative detailing and a tiled roof. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Superior rooms are 18-24sqm and elegantly decorated in rich colours with classic furniture design and black and white photographic prints on the walls. Amenities include a flat-screen TV, mini-bar, work desk, safe and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub or walk-in shower. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
